The usage value agreement is defined as the relative importance of each plant type known to be used as herbal medicine. This index is useful in identifying plants with the highest use (most frequently mentioned) in the treatment of a disease with a given informant consensus factor (ICF) value. ICF (ranging from 0 to 1) is used to deduce the homogeneity in the data on the use of a specific plant to treat a certain disease.
